# cm015 - November 20, 2018

## Overview

* Define hypothesis testing and $p$-value
* Define and practice the Wald test
* Relate the Wald test to a $t$-test
* Summarize the $\chi^2$ distribution
* Summarize the likelihood ratio test
* Explain the importance of correcting for multiple testing
